rpc.design
Class Path

java.lang.Object
  rpc.design.Path
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributePath, StructurePath
public abstract class Path
extends java.lang.Object

The abstract path class stores the necessary information and basic methods for relational variables. A relational variable consists of a base item, a path through the schema to some target item and its cardinality, and a variable on that target item.

Method Detail

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
Compares this path to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the paths have the same base items, target items, variables, cardinalities, and paths through the schema.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
o - the object to compare this path against.
Returns:
true if the paths are equal; false otherwise.
